optionsTitle.description: The title of the options page.

extensionDescription.message: 一个简化的代理管理器，让您精确而轻松地浏览网络。

newProfile.description: Button to create a new profile.

applyChanges.description: Button to save and apply settings.

welcomeMessage.message: 从列表中选择一个配置文件以查看或编辑其设置，或创建一个新的配置文件开始使用。

profileNameLabel.description: Label for the profile name input field.

proxyServerLegend.description: Legend for the proxy server settings fieldset.

bypassListLegend.description: Legend for the bypass list settings fieldset.

bypassListDescription.message: 您不希望使用任何代理的服务器：（每行一个服务器）
bypassListDescription.description: A small description for the bypass list textarea.

proxyHostPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the proxy server host input.

proxyPortPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the proxy server port input.

deleteProfile.description: Button to delete the current profile.

connectionFailed.description: Message when connection to background script fails.

bypassListNote.message: 注意：'<local>' 是一个特殊模式，匹配所有不包含点的主机名。'127.0.0.1'、'::1' 和 'localhost' 是应该包含的常见本地地址。
bypassListNote.description: Note about bypass list special patterns.

directConnectionDetails.description: Details text for direct connection profile.

systemProxyDetails.description: Details text for system proxy profile.
